author: Staff Reporter
text:
Bundles of match boxes were destroyed in a fire in a match factory godown on Ilayarasanendal Road in Kovilpatti on Wednesday.

The cause of the fire was yet to be ascertained, said Additional District Fire Officer S. Thavamani. He said that they received the fire call at 6.10 a.m.. Four fire tenders battled for over three hours to bring the blaze under control. The fire was extinguished around 9.30 a.m.
title: Fire in match factory
